name: undefine
description: Universal Module Loader, for node.js, browser scripts, bundles, and AMD define loaders

scripts.stats: cd dist && cat undefine-min.js | gzip > undefine-min.js.gz && cat ../undefine.js | gzip > undefine.js.gz && cat undefine-min.map | gzip > undefine-min.map.gz && wc ../undefine.js * | grep -v total && rm *.gz

author: Reactive Sets
